attributes.additional_details: I think this is against your civil rights and could force people into doing something they don’t want to do. Not every person wether it’s choice or not can’t for medical reasons have the vaccine. So don’t discriminate on these people
attributes.background: Do not make it law that people need a vaccine passport to travel abroad

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
